summary: A musician with hyper-sensitive hearing goes in search of an ominous sound that plagues him, but is inaudible to everyone else.
cast: Silas Gordon Brigham|Sam Repshas|Cate Buscher|Josh Davidson|Ricardo Kingsbury|Nate Walker|Carolina Monte Rosa|Regen Wilson|David Segal|Anand Upender|Juliana Schoettler|Firas Natour|Jennifer Knight|Melanie Avant|Jim Cigno|MaryAnn Griffin|John C. Bailey|Linda Gordon|Tony Hacsi|Madhvi Upender
title: Ultrasonic
